document_data.name: Dustgrub
document_data.mainbody: '''Dustgrub''' was a robust [[carrion crawler]] that lived in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: The creature hunted on the west side of the city, not far from the [[Burial Glen]].
